name: Coach Replacement Straps and Repair for Purses, Bags and More
description:
Do you need a strap replaced for your Coach bag? Are you having difficulty finding an exact replacement or is a strap from Coach (contact an official Coach retailer for details) out of your price range?

Then you've come to the right place! Mautto is the premier source for genuine leather and chain straps for handbags, purses, clutches, cross body and bags of many types. We offer high quality, handmade straps that can be quickly attached to your existing bag’s hardware...for a fraction of the cost of replacing your cherished Coach bag. And we've been doing this for years. Enough of what we think...our customers say it best! Check out some Testimonials & Customer Reviews NOTE: We do not provide original or replica Coach straps. However, in some cases we can repair your strap. Contact us now for more information.

Genuine Leather Straps by Mautto

Our leather straps come in over 25 different colors, 4 widths, many lengths and over 6 hardware finishes. Rest assured that you'll find a strap that meets or exceeds the quality of your old strap and provides the same functionality.
Most straps are offered in your choice of 25 leather colors. If you can't find the color or combination you're looking for, we carry over 75 colors available for custom order. See our Leather Colors & Chain Options for details.

Strap Extenders

Our Guarantee & Customer Service

Your complete satisfaction is guaranteed and we offer a generous return policy. Please see our Customer Service page for details. All orders are made by hand and ship in 1-3 weeks, free of charge. We do offer Rush Processing & Priority Shipping options for your convenience. Everything we do, we do for you! Contact us at any time for immediate customer service.

About Mautto

Mautto has been helping save handbags – one replacement strap at a time – for many years. name: Custom Strap Modification for Noreen's Marc Jacobs Chain Strap
description:
This is a custom modification for a Marc Jacobs chain strap.  The existing chain only strap will have a portion of leather added to the center of the strap (shoulder portion).

The strap will be made with black leather, using the best match to the leather at the ends of the existing strap.  The leather portion added, 6.5", will be made as close to the Marc Jacobs chain and leather combination photo as possible.

The chain links removed will be returned.

name: Fendi Bag Drawstring Strap Replacement - Crossbody Strap - 58" (inches) - Your Choice of Leather
description:
Trouble finding a Drawstring replacement strap for your Fendi bag? Mautto creates alternative replacement straps that meet or exceed the quality standards of designer bags, provide similar functionality, and allow you to choose a color that meets your needs. Simply choose your leather color and you'll be able enjoy your beautiful bag once again with a new strap. This replacement strap is designed for Fendi bag straps that are weaved through a hole (as pictured) and secured with a simple knot. The new strap will be made using the following measurements and materials: Length: 58" Total Length (allows for the knots) Leather: Choose from the many colors available Hardware: No Hardware. The ends will be knotted after weaved through slits at the sides of the handbag. Width: .375" (inch)

name: Mautto's Eco Friendly Market Tote
description:
MORE COMING SOON!

Stay tuned for more of these popular, eco-friendly totes. Contact us today for a custom order! We have more patterns to choose from than currently available online. Mautto has a selection of fashionable Eco Friendly Market Totes made from leather-like fabrics. An excellent, and affordable choice to carry your books, travel needs or for market shopping. Each one is light weight and built to last. The narrow shoulder straps help to lighten the load, but don't let them fool you, they are very sturdy with 4 layers of rolled material and stitched to carry the load, and, stay on your shoulder. Choose from a Crocodile embossed print in either Chestnut Brown or Warm Brown, an imitation Leather fabric with stitched colored circles in beautiful fall colors or a lightly metallic Sea Foam Green. Bags are unlined, however, the fabric is backed, so it will have the appearance of a lining. Dimensions: 13"W X 11.75"H X 2.5"D Strap Drop Length: 12.5" All created in Mautto's Santa Cruz, CA Studio

name: Large Designer Leather Shopping Tote in Fashionable Hawaiian Floral Print
description:
This large genuine leather designer tote is a trendy woman's dream. Featuring lots of space, this carry-all bag is perfect for travel, small grocery trips, overnight getaways, cool Moms, day trips and more.

Handmade from genuine leather and features a Hawaiian floral stamped pattern in two-tone brown and dark gray. The durable textured leather has a subtle shine that looks beautiful in light and is easily cleaned. The print and colors hide soiling or other light damage.

Bag utilizes double leather handles for extra comfort in matching steel gray. This tote can hold a lot of weight and folds up nicely for storing.

The top is rolled down and all seams are doubled for extra strength. Unlined and features a zipper pocket inside to secure your keys, cell phone and other items.

Measurements (about the size of a standard grocery bag):
15.5" Tall
13.5" Wide
8.5" Deep
10.5" Shoulder Drop Length

name: LAURA's Little Black Bag - Small Leather Messenger Bag - Italian Black Leather with Diamond Studs
description:
'Laura' is a small Messenger bag that has a casual to semi formal look. "Laura's Little Black Bag", is an inspired designed by a frequent Mautto fan! With the decorative crystal accents on one side and the plain envelope flap at the front, it can easily be dressed up or down by switching it from front to back. It's made in a soft to the touch Italian black leather that is lightly distressed and semi glossy. The back has a zippered pocket with decorative clear crystal rivet accents along the zipper and is leather lined. It's a 4 inch zipper opening, with a pocket of 3 X 5 inches. Two leather zipper pulls are both decorated with the diamond rivet as well. The lining is made in satin fabric and comes in Lime Green, Olive Green, Teal Blue or Iridescent Tan. Open the front flap and you'll see a surprise band of the satin lining and three diamond rivets to greet you. What a fun and sexy touch! A zipper closure to the main compartment will secure your items. The main strap has 7 inches of silver chain at each side with adjustable leather strapping for cross body messenger style. I have included an additional leather strap with a 13" drop length to use as a shoulder strap for more formal wear. Both are removable so that it can be used as a clutch as well. Additional diamond rivets are used on the leather strap too!

"Beautiful little bag--subtly chic with just a few diamond studs and a chain carry option, and a great accessory for just about any evening outing. I've used it numerous times already. Extremely fine leather and workmanship." -Jennifer (Purchased a "LAURA" bag.)

All Mautto Handbags are Designed and handcrafted in Lynette's Santa Cruz, CA studio. Approximate Dimensions: 5” Tall 7.75” Wide Weight: 9 oz.

name: LIMITED TIME SALE! Black Suede Leather Wallet or Small Messenger - Removable Straps - ANNIE
description:
35% off the original price of $108

Only 3 left in stock! A popular and exclusive Mautto design, "Annie" is a zippered wallet that can be used as a small messenger bag. Annie has a center divider in the main compartment for easy organization, including 2 credit card slots, each able to hold 6-8 cards easily, and an outside zippered pocket for coins or other smaller items.
  • Made with a soft embossed suede leather in black with mums showing as a highlight.
  • Double stitched, cross design at the front, centered with decorative crystal and silver stud.
  • Lined in a delicate pink with black polka-dot cotton fabric.
  • Up-cycled, all new materials.
  • Simple yet contemporary and classic look.
This darling little bag could also be used as a clutch, wristlet, shoulder bag or cross body bag. Comes with two matching removable straps: one wristlet and one shoulder (or crossbody) strap. The outside zippered pocket can hold an iPod, iPhone or other cell phones and MP3 players. A standard sized Passport will fit in the main section with room to spare.

"So soft and lovely. I love the pockets and lining, too." -Yolanda, CA (Purchased the "ANNIE" bag.)

All Mautto handbags are designed and crafted by hand in Santa Cruz, California. Ships in 1 business day. Free Shipping in the USA and discounted internationally Approximate Dimensions: 4.5” Tall 8” Wide Weight: 3 oz.

name: Brown Leather iPad Sleeve - Removable Strap - PAYTON
description:
'PAYTON' is a new iPad Sleeve design for Mautto. This gives you a stylish sleeve to protect your device with the convenience of a removable strap. A soft leather with a nice sheen that's Croc embossed is used with Brushed Gold Hardware detail for a classic executive design. The outside measurements are 10.75 inches wide and 12 inches tall. It's made to fit an iPad with a little room all around, so you could fit your device with a cover. Choose between two linings of copper satin or gold which is water resistant synthetic fabric. Both allows the device to slip in easily. A layer of padding helps to protect your device. The strap is 5/8" wide and is adjustable for a crossbody hip length. A simple, contemporary and classic look.

"Love it. Beautifully made, stylish yet practical. Thank you so much." -Sharon (Purchased a "PAYTON" bag.)

All Mautto Handbags are Designed and handcrafted in Lynette's Santa Cruz, CA studio. Approximate Dimensions: 12” Tall 10.75” Wide Strap: Maximum length 53" Weight: 10 oz.

name: Chic Black Leather Handbag - Leopard Hair Leather - ANNA BELLE
description:
This beautifully Chic Black handbag featuring a Hair on Leopard Leather is fun and elegant yet made and sized for everyday use.

The main leather is an Italian leather with a soft crinkled finish. The center front panel is an amazing Leopard embossed hair on hide in beautiful brown tones. I've added antique brass studs and heavy hammered Rings at the handles that give the feel of the leopard look. Very Sexy and Chic!

It’s lined in a copper/brass colored satin taffeta fabric with the pouch pockets trimmed in matching leather and includes a zippered pocket and two pouch pockets.

Two shoulder straps, zippered closure, an outside pocket with invisible snap and protector feet at the bottom complete this bag.

A simple yet contemporary look with plenty of city style.

Free shipping in the USA and discounted shipping internationally.

All Mautto handbags are designed and hand crafted in my Santa Cruz, California studio.

12.75” Wide at Base
12” Wide at Opening

description:
Jessica is a Medium to Large hobo bag. It has simple lines, a single shoulder strap, zippered top, quality Brushed Gold hardware and a large outside flap covered pocket.

This one is in a beautiful Burgundy Brown Leather. The Brushed Gold hardware and studs really finish off this bag. Take a look at the cute floral magnetic snap on the outside pocket. You'll appreciate the protector feet at the bottom too!

The inside is fully lined in a cotton print fabric and includes two zipper pockets to secure items and two pouch pockets and pen slot with matching leather detail.

All Mautto handbags are designed and created in my Santa Cruz, Ca studio with love and care to the detail that you'll appreciate.

Will ship within 24 hours. Free Shipping in the USA and discounted internationally.

name: Chestnut Brown Leather Strapped-Pleated Shoulder Bag - Brown Croc Leather - SARAH
description:
This Sarah Strapped and Pleated handbag has the popular slouchy look, yet with design detail that gives it both a classy and youthful look. The Sarah design is Mautto's most popular seller. It's made in a Chestnut Brown smooth leather with a Classy Crocodile embossed leather accent at the top. The quality Brushed Brass hardware give this bag such a refined look. This new design for the Sarah bag includes a zippered pocket on the outside to secure items that everyone loves to have. This one has a zippered closure at the top. The size is large enough for everything you could want in an everyday bag with room to spare. It’s lined in a brown quality satin fabric and includes two zippered pockets along with two pouch pockets for your quick grab items and a pen pocket. A contemporary, stylish bag for everyday use.

"The quality of the workmanship and the leather is top notch and the design is modern and stylish, while still being classic enough that I will be able to use it for years...this particular design has the wonderful quality of having a modern, slightly slouchy look, but the purse has enough structure to stay upright on its own, which makes it look more polished and makes it easier to get in and out of when you are driving or have it sitting on a table top...Now I finally own a purse that not only looks good, but works hard to support my lifestyle...Like others, I too will be a repeat customer for any future handbag needs." -Tricia (Purchased a "SARAH" bag.)

All Mautto handbags are designed and handmade by Lynette in her Santa Cruz, CA studio. Dimensions: 12” Tall 16” Wide at Base 14” Wide at Opening 5 1/2” Deep 13” Handle Drop Length Weight: 2 lbs.

name: Red Floral Leather Bucket Bag With Brushed Gold Hardware - CHLOE
description:
The Chloe bag has been one of Mautto's favorite designs. It's a Medium/Large bucket bag with snaps around the opening and on the sides to allow the bag to expand and have a few different looks.

The Red Floral Embossed leather on this handbag is soft to the touch and has a sheen to it.

This is an excellent sized bag for everyday use. It expands as your day is filled with errands and stuff! Let out the snaps at the sides and fill it up!

The shoulder straps are attached with heavy duty Brushed Gold hooks and O-Rings.

This bag is lined in a beautiful burgundy red satin fabric with golden embroidery stitching. It includes two zipper pockets to secure items, two pouch pockets for your cell phone, pen, PDA and a quick snap key fob so you don't have to dig for those keys when you need them!

Lastly, two outside pockets with magnetic snaps to access those quick items and keep the bag organized as well as purse protectors at the bottom.

All Mautto handbags are designed and handmade by Lynette in her Santa Cruz, CA studio.

Will ship within 24 hours.  Free shipping in the USA and discounted shipping internationally.

11” Wide
7” Deep
12” Shoulder Straps drop length

Weight: 2 lb.

name: Rush Processing PLUS Priority Shipping Add-On
description:
Purchase this add-on and receive RUSH PROCESSING, plus, PRIORITY SHIPPING with your strap order.

For RUSH PROCESSING only, choose the $9.99 option and your order will ship the next business day via Standard Shipping. If you'd like priority placement in the order queue with expedited shipping, simply add this option to your cart, along with your strap(s), and complete checkout. That's it! Here's what you can expect:
  • Your order ships within 24 hours (or the next business day)
  • Your order ships via USPS Priority Mail (2-3 day delivery in the USA)
For USA customers, this typically means you'll receive your strap(s) in 3-4 days of placing your order. For comparison, orders completed without this add-on (standard processing and shipping) typically arrive in 8-24 days of placing an order.

International Customers

Canada: Choose "Canada" from the drop-down to have your shipping upgraded to Priority Mail Express International and get enhanced tracking information, as well as, RUSH PROCESSING on your order. Priority Mail Express International shipping to Canada guarantees arrival within 3-5 business days.

For Canadian customers, this typically means you'll receive your strap(s) in 4-6 days of placing your order. For comparison, orders completed without this add-on (standard processing and shipping) typically arrive in 10-30 days of placing an order for $17. This add-on is in addition to the $17 standard shipping charge for Canada and provides priority shipping and rush processing for your order.

All countries outside of USA and Canada: Choose "All other Countries" from the drop-down to have your shipping upgraded to Priority Mail Express International and get enhanced tracking information, as well as, RUSH PROCESSING on your order. Priority Mail Express International shipping guarantees arrival to most countries in 3-5 business days (some countries up to 10 business days).

For most customers outside of USA and Canada, this typically means you'll receive your strap(s) in 4-6 days of placing your order. For comparison, orders completed without this add-on (standard processing and shipping) typically arrive in 10-30 days of placing an order for $21. This add-on is in addition to the $21 standard shipping charge for most international countries and provides priority shipping and rush processing for your order.

PLEASE NOTE: One add-on is good for up to three items (per order). This add-on cannot be refunded. Once packages are in USPS hands, we cannot be responsible for their delivery performance. All delivery times are provided by USPS and represent typical scenarios; most will arrive on time, some may arrive sooner, some later.

LONG = 4" (inches) in Leather Length

The Tassel is made with your choice of a GOLD or NICKEL hardware cap that includes an attachable O-Ring with spring opening so it can be quickly and easily attached to your existing handbag hardware or strap. 

This can also be used as a key chain accessory.
